TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RayHitTestParameters extends System.Windows.Media.Media3D.HitTestParameters3D
Public NotInheritable Class RayHitTestParameters Inherits HitTestParameters3D

summary.span: 指定沿光線之點擊測試的參數。

span.span: Specifies the parameters of a hit test along a ray.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意 visual 的圖層，支援點或幾何，不只是最上層的物件下的所有物件的點擊都測試。Note that the visual layer supports hit testing against all objects under a point or geometry, not just the topmost object. 2D 點擊的測試也會傳回正下方指定的點或幾何 3D 結果。A 2D hit test will also return 3D results directly under the specified point or geometry.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D origin, valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D direction) cil managed
Public Sub New (origin As Point3D, direction As Vector3D)

span.span: Point3D at which the ray originates.
Vector3D that indicates the direction of the ray.

summary.span: 建立指定光線來源和方向的物件執行個體，點擊測試會沿著此光線進行。

span.span: Creates an instance of the object that specifies the origin and direction of the ray along which to hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意 visual 的圖層，支援點或幾何，不只是最上層的物件下的所有物件的點擊都測試。Note that the visual layer supports hit testing against all objects under a point or geometry, not just the topmost object. 2D 點擊的測試也會傳回正下方指定的點或幾何 3D 結果。A 2D hit test will also return 3D results directly under the specified point or geometry.

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，指定沿著其路徑進行點擊測試之射線的方向 (從其原點開始)。

span.span: Gets or sets a that indicates the direction (from its origin) of the ray along which to hit test.

value.span: 指出沿著其路徑進行點擊測試之射線方向的 Vector3D。

span.span: Vector3D that indicates the direction of the ray along which to hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意 visual 的圖層，支援點或幾何，不只是最上層的物件下的所有物件的點擊都測試。Note that the visual layer supports hit testing against all objects under a point or geometry, not just the topmost object. 2D 點擊的測試也會傳回正下方指定的點或幾何 3D 結果。A 2D hit test will also return 3D results directly under the specified point or geometry. ## Examples [!code-csharp[hittest3d#HitTest3D3DN4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTest3D/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#hittest3d3dn4)] [!code-vb[hittest3d#HitTest3D3DN4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTest3D/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#hittest3d3dn4)]
